title: NHL Draft 2020: 1st-Round Mock Predictions and Latest Order
description: While the current  NHL  season is suspended due to concerns about the coronavirus pandemic, teams are surely always in prepare-for-the-future mode even amid uncertainty about the rest of the 2019-20 campaign...
content: Petr David Josek Associated Press While the current NHL season is suspended due to concerns about the coronavirus pandemic teams are surely always in prepare for the future mode even amid uncertainty about the rest of the campaign With that in min chars
